meanings.sent1: The artist created an ovoidal sculpture of a bird's nest.
meanings.sent2: The ovoidal rock on the beach looked like a giant egg.
meanings.sent3: The ovoidal balloon floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her face had an ovoidal appearance, like a perfect oval.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship had an ovoidal design, sleek and aerodynamic.

meanings.sent1: The planetarium displayed a large ovoidal model of the solar system.
meanings.sent2: The chocolate candies were all in the shape of colorful ovoidals.
meanings.sent3: The alien spaceship had a strange ovoidal form, unlike any other.
meanings.sent4: The crystal ball was not perfectly round but had a mystical ovoidal shape.
meanings.sent5: The gemstone had a unique ovoidal cut, catching the light beautifully.
